name: Sonic World Adrenaline
text: You can banish 1 "Sonic" monster you control: Special Summon 1 "Sonic" monster with a different name from your Deck or GY. You can banish this card from your GY: Special Summon 1 "Sonic Duck" from your hand or Deck. You can only activate the first effect of "Sonic World Adrenaline" once per turn.
